scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.js && sabayon ./test/sw.js && npm run size
scripts.size: echo -e "\x1b[1mfile          size\x1b[0m"; echo "main          $(cat dist/main.js | brotli | wc -c)"; echo "worker        $(cat dist/worker.js | brotli | wc -c)"; echo "window/worker $(cat dist/window/worker.js | brotli | wc -c)"; echo "window/main   $(cat dist/window/main.js | brotli | wc -c)";
